title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials               Curriculum Materials       The Adobe PDF documents below will assist teachers in preparing age-appropriate classroom lessons on Theodore Roosevelt and his era. Sagamore Hill NHS - Teacher's Preparation Packet for Elementary Schools. Sagamore Hill NHS - Teacher's Preparation Packet for Secondary Schools. The Adobe PDF documents below host lesson plans for U.S. History students in 8th and 11th grade. They were developed by the park's Teacher - Ranger - Teacher. "Research with a Ranger" - 8th Grade Lesson Plan, by John Cipriano. "Theodore Roosevelt and the Great War" - 11th Grade Lesson Plan, by John Cipriano.  "Roosevelt's Corollary"- Grades 9-12, by Andrew Buttermilch. A newly revised teacher's manual of activities specifically aimed at creating civic-minded and responsible students is now available for download below: "Theodore Roosevelt and Responsible Citizenship" - a collection of creative arts based activities aimed at students in grades 5 through 8. This activity guide is the result of a collaboration between the Theodore Roosevelt Association, a congressionally chartered not-for-profit organization, and the National Park Service. We hope that you find each of these guides to be helpful in preparation for a group visit to Sagamore Hill NHS.
